item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Happiness is the consequence of personal effort. You fight for it, strive for it, insist upon it, and sometimes even travel around the world looking for it. You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestations of your own blessings. And once you have achieved a state of happiness, you must never become lax about maintaining it. You must make a mighty effort to keep swimming upward into that happiness forever, to stay afloat on top of it." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Faith is walking face-first and full-speed into the dark. If we truly knew all the answers in advance as to the meaning of life and the nature of God and the destiny of our souls, our belief would not be a leap of faith and it would not be a courageous act of humanity; it would just be... a prudent insurance policy." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Stop wearing your wishbone where your backbone ought to be." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Destiny, I feel, is also a relationship - a play between divine grace and willful self-effort." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description:
"People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.
A true soul mate is probably the most important person you'll ever meet, because they tear down your walls and smack you awake. But to live with a soul mate forever? Nah. Too painful. Soul mates, they come into your life just to reveal another layer of yourself to you, and then leave.
A soul mates purpose is to shake you up, tear apart your ego a little bit, show you your obstacles and addictions, break your heart open so new light can get in, make you so desperate and out of control that you have to transform your life, then introduce you to your spiritual master..." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When each day is the same as the nest it's because people fail to reconize the good things that happen in thier lives everyday the sunrises," -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "The inability to open up to hope is what blocks trust, and blocked trust is the reason for blighted dreams." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyday God gives us a moment in which it is possible to change everything that makes us unhappy." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "In desperate love, we always invent the characters of our partners, demanding they be what we need of them, and then feeling devastated when they refuse to perform the role we created in the first place." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Jean de La Fontaine
item.description: "Everyone calls himself a friend, but only a fool relies on it: nothing is commoner than the name, nothing rarer than the thing." -- Jean de La Fontaine

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "The more exquisitely and delightfully you can do nothing, the higher your life's achievement." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "This was my moment to look for the kind of healing and peace that can only come from solitude." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "The ingredients of both darkness and light are equally present in all of us,...The madness of this planet is largely a result of the human being's difficulty in coming to viruous balance with himself. " -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "A poem begins as a lump in the throat, a sense of wrong, a homesickness, a lovesickness." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "There's a reason we refer to "leaps of faith" - because the decision to consent to any notion of divinity is a mighty jump from the rational over to the unknowable, and I don't care how diligently scholars of every religion will try to sit you down with their stacks of books and prove to you through scripture that their faith is indeed rational; it isn't. If faith were rational, it wouldn't be - by definition - faith. Faith is belief in what you cannot see or prove or touch. Faith is walking face-first and full-speed into the dark. If we truly knew all the answers in advance as to the meaning of life and the nature of God and the destiny of our souls, our belief would not be a leap of faith and it would not be a courageous act of humanity; it would just be... a prudent insurance policy." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Every search begins with beginner’s luck. And every search ends with the victor’s being severely tested." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You have the opposite of poker face. You have like.. miniature golf face." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "If someone thinks that peace and love are just a cliche that must have been left behind in the 60s, that's a problem. Peace and love are eternal." -- John Lennon

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "I think I deserve something beautiful." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "People tend to think that happiness is a stroke of luck, something that will descend like fine weather if you're fortunate. But happiness is the result of personal effort. You fight for it, strive for it, insist upon it, and sometimes even travel around the world looking for it. You have to participate relentlessly." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Whenever I hear anyone arguing for slavery, I feel a strong impulse to see it tried on him personally." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Never forget that once upon a time, in an unguarded moment, you recognized yourself as a friend." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Sawsan add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "To lose balance sometimes for love is part of living a balanced life." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
